reviews.review:
Dead by Daylight rolls out like a playable horror movie, pitting an unstoppable villain against a group of up to four survivors running for their lives. The team of survivors has nothing to rely on but their wits while avoiding their lone foe. The goal is the same in each map: Victims must locate and power a number of generators, find one of two exits, throw the switch, and escape. The killer needs to stop them.

+ Relatively fun gameplay
+ Can be really addicting
+ Pretty nice level-up system
+ Unique Killers and Survivors
+ The ranking system feels fair
+ Quite nice amount of skills and items

Despite there being a tiered skill ranking for survivors and killers, the game shouldn't be considered a balanced competitive game (it's asymmetric, it will never be perfectly balanced). It is a game that can be enjoyed casually without too much commitment, but I do believe the skill progression and simple mechanics (that can be difficult to master) bring a lot of players back.

As a survivor the majority of the skills you want will be available with the base game, however, if you want to be able to maximise on a killer you will likely need the majority of the DLC to unlock the necessary skills to remain competitive with survivors which can be pricey.

The game does have a lot of bugs, the developers even quipped about how fixing one seems to yield more than when they created it during a recent anniversary event, some of the maps are homages to their respective DLC and have made for quite an unbalanced mess (Haddonfield and Midwich come to mind specifically).

Echoing the sentiments of other reviewers, the majority of the community harbours a terrible and entitled attitude much of which comes from the group mentality of survivors. It is worse on PvP MMO's or even games like LoL but these guys are a special breed that come from an us vs. them attitude that the paradigm of the game naturally fosters. It really is hard to describe it until you see it in action, but it definitely is not what you want to be spending your leisure time putting up with.

TLDR: Worth a go if the price is right given it's 4 years old, don't engage with the trolls, you'll need the DLC if you want to get an edge as a killer.

Look... if you got friends to play it with, it's easily among the most fun games you can ever play. You can do a bunch of shit and have a few great laughs. The gameplay albeit repetitive is most of the time entertaining and keeps your on edge for a certain amount of time. The first ten to fifteen hours will be the most fun and terrifying times you're ever going to have. 

Now, if you're alone, then this is really where it gets a lot more toxic and dark. If you play killer, don't be surprised to be flamed for your playstyle no matter the outcome of the game. Everyone is going to have expectations and personally crafted rules that, once crossed, will automatically label you as «baby killer» or a «tunneling piece of shit» and might ruin your experience. Some maps will be great for you, some won't. You might get SWF and not catch anyone. You might get potatoes and slaughter everyone. Point is - it doesn't matter and the Ranked system will not reward you in any way other than achievements. 

As for suvivor SoloQ, don't expect anything from it. People will sandbag you, throw pallets in your face in chase, side with the killer and sell you out to them. As I've said, this game looses half of it's fun if you are a solo player so really think carefully before you go in alone. Add that to the absolutely terrible matchmaking system at higher ranks and you get the perfect toxic cocktail that is this game. 

Now, would I recommend it to anyone? Yes, sure. But as I said, only with friends. 

Other than that, if you can't handle the toxic community, look elsewhere.

The game in it of itself is good the idea is good and there is a steady stream of content that is usually good, for a 4 year old game, their creativity doesn't seem to be diminishing, playing with friends is fun and the systems through the game are mostly fair. But the game does have some glaring negatives firstly is the match making system, unless playing with friends you run the risk of inexperienced players and a much better killer, and that can make the game unfun. Another issue is hit boxes and hit reg in general, the dedicated servers made this a little better but when playing with friends in different states or countries, no chance. some of the maps have very poor design and others have great design pretty hit or miss IMO. Over all I think the game is really good and I do enjoy it I would just like to see more dev interaction with player suggestions and patching bugs, as well as cracking down on cheaters.

Jogo bem divertido de jogar com os amigos como Sobrevivente e solo como Assassino, tem uma curva de aprendizado moderada.
O tutorial é bem fraco e não te ensina a malandragem do jogo, aconselho ter alguém pra te ensinar pra evitar frustrações.

O gameplay é bem único e divertido: 

Os sobreviventes consertam geradores espalhados pelo mapa para ativar a energia da alavanca do portão, depois abrem o portão e fogem do mapa.

O assassino golpeia os sobreviventes (das maneiras mais criativas possíveis), danifica os geradores e pendura os sobreviventes caídos no gancho para serem sacrificados pra uma entidade aí (Que me lembra o Hermaeus Mora do Skyrim só que versão hardcore(gosta de empalar os outros ><'))

É basicamente um pega-pega com um esconde-esconde atrelado, os sobreviventes fogem e se escondem do assassino, driblam de maneiras que fariam jogadores de futebol sentir inveja, derrubam pallets na cara do assassino, cegam com lanterna, sabotam seus ganchos, uma verdadeira traquinagem.
Os assassinos tem gameplays e mecânicas variadas, colocar armadilhas no chão. arremessar machados, teleportes, jogar cachaça na tua cara, te deixar doidão com choques, te prender em pesadelos, ficar te encarando infinito (Michael Myers OMEGALUL), vomitar em você; enfim, são bem singulares.

O jogo tem um sistema de progressão de Rank e Level.

Os gráficos são bonitinhos, cartoonizados demais na minha opinião pra um jogo supostamente de terror, entretanto, é inegável que você em algum momento vai se sentir nervoso ouvindo a canção da caçadora (acompanhado de batimentos cardíacos) aumentando e sabendo que a maluca dos machados tá te caçando, ou você estando de boa, se sentindo minimamente seguro quando vem um trem bala do outro lado do mapa com uma motosserra querendo te comer.

Minha única crítica ao jogo, é a quantidade de DLC's, 15 reais por cada é dolorido pra muita gente, por isso aconselho a comprá-las somente numa promoção ou se gostar MUITO do jogo; O jogo base por si só é divertido e dá pra experimentar bem.

Also I love how nurse plays and how evil you just feel being the nurse. I love it but hate it at the same time.

黎明杀机（✘）欢乐农场（✔），非常好的一款游戏，只要你不怕几场游戏下来肺都气炸（特指屠夫玩家），那么这款抗压训练游戏就非常适合你；人类玩家目前版本比较轻松，但新人很容易没体验（指上树一挂死），不过当你习惯这一切之后，慢慢地就能找到这款游戏的乐趣了。死亡不是结束，初来乍到的雾中人们，期待与你们的相见。

motor motor

Es un Juego multijugador de 5 personas online, 4 sobrevivientes y 1 asesino, en un escenario escogido random o por algún jugador a través de una "ofrenda"(la cuál otorga un porcentaje para que halla más posibilidades que salga ese mapa "escogido" por ofrenda en cuestión), aun que no siempre sale escogido.

En cada mapa hay varios motores (7 en total). Reparando 5 motores se activan 2 interruptores para abrir 2 puertas finales y (1 escotilla que aparece activando 4 motores, esta escotilla puede aparecer en un lugar "X" en el mapa o en un lugar específico si es que se utilizó alguna ofrenda que define el lugar de aparición) abriendo cualquiera de esas puertas los sobrevivientes pueden escapar y finalizar su juego.

Juego de Sobreviviente
Consiste básicamente en escapar del asesino, ayudar a los compañeros, reparar motores y usar las habilidades que escogen para burlar, cegar, curar, purificar y escapar.

Juego de Asesino
Consiste en No dejar escapar al sobreviviente, con la ayuda de las habilidades de cada asesino y con su arma por defecto, molestar, perseguir, atacar, herir, interrumpir el progreso de los motores, cerrar la escotilla, colgar y matar.

cada vez que escoges habilidades (perks) debes hacerlo siguiendo una estrategia, pues hay habilidades que pueden hacer un combo y sacar una mayor ventaja que si vas con las perks por default. Al conjunto de habilidades se les dice "build".

en fin es un juego muy entretenido, lo recomiendo para jugar con amigos, no se ve mucha "toxicidad".
